description: Complex analytical queries requiring synthesis and comparison

queries.query: Compare the privacy risks of AI versus the security risks. Which category has more documented incidents?
What is the trend in AI bias risks from 2020 to 2024? Are they increasing or decreasing?
Rank the top 5 AI risk categories by severity and explain your ranking methodology
What percentage of AI risks are related to employment? Break it down by sector if possible.
How do AI risks in healthcare differ from AI risks in finance? Provide a detailed comparison.
What is the correlation between model size and bias risks? Do larger models have more bias issues?
Analyze the geographic distribution of AI safety research. Which countries contribute most?
What are the intersections between privacy risks and security risks in AI systems?
Calculate the average number of citations per risk category and identify outliers
How has the definition of 'AI alignment' evolved over time according to the repository?
What is the ratio of technical risks to societal risks in the repository? Show the breakdown.
Identify patterns in AI incidents. What are the common failure modes?
Cross-reference employment risks with automation risks. What's the overlap?
What is the distribution of risk severity levels across different AI application domains?
Analyze the co-occurrence of risks. Which risks commonly appear together?
What is the median, mean, and mode of risk citations? Interpret the distribution.
How do short-term AI risks differ from long-term AI risks in terms of research focus?
Map the causal relationships between different AI risks. Which risks lead to others?
What is the Pareto distribution of AI risks? Do 20% of categories account for 80% of incidents?
Synthesize a meta-analysis of AI governance risks across different regulatory frameworks
